<div type="collation" xml:id="C13"> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C13"/><lb n="c56-0073__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0073.05" unit="tei:head"/> <seg sID="C13_app2-fMS"/> Chap. 9<shi rend="sup"> </shi> <anchor xml:id="c56-0073.05"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__2"/>On <seg eID="C13_app2-fMS"/> my <seg sID="C13_app4-fMS"/> return <seg eID="C13_app4-fMS"/> I found the following letter <lb n="c56-0073__main__3"/>from my <seg sID="C13_app6-fMS"/> father. <lb n="c56-0073__main__4"/> To V.–Frankenstein <lb n="c56-0073__main__5"/>Geneva – June 2<shi rend="sup"> d</shi>– 17— <lb n="c56-0073__main__6"/>My dear Victor <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__7"/>You <seg eID="C13_app6-fMS"/> have probably waited <w ana="start"/>impati<lb n="c56-0073__main__8"/>ently<w ana="end"/> <seg sID="C13_app8-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0073__main__d5e15283">the</del> for <seg eID="C13_app8-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C13_app16-fMS"/> you <anchor xml:id="c56-0073.04"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0073.02"/> – <seg eID="C13_app16-fMS"/> but that would be <seg sID="C13_app18-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15351"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15353"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15353"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15359"/>a <seg eID="C13_app18-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app19-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15359"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0073__main__d5e15362">very</del> <mod eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15351"/> cruel <seg eID="C13_app19-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app20-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15366"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15368"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15368"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15374"/>kindness <seg eID="C13_app20-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15374"/><mod eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15366"/><lb n="c56-0073__main__12"/>and I dare not do it. What would <seg sID="C13_app22-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15381"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15383"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15383"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15389"/>be <seg eID="C13_app22-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15389"/><mod eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15381"/>your <seg sID="C13_app24-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__13"/>surprise <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0073__main__d5e15395">be</del> , <seg eID="C13_app24-fMS"/> my <seg sID="C13_app26-fMS"/> son <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0073__main__d5e15398">e</del> , <seg eID="C13_app26-fMS"/> when <seg sID="C13_app28-fMS"/> your <seg eID="C13_app28-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>ex<lb n="c56-0073__main__14"/>pected<w ana="end"/> a happy and <seg sID="C13_app30-fMS"/> gay <seg eID="C13_app30-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app31-fMS"/> welcome <seg eID="C13_app31-fMS"/> to <seg sID="C13_app33-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0073__main__d5e15408">heho</del> <lb n="c56-0073__main__15"/>beh <mod sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15413"/> <mdel>o</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15417"/>e <sga-add eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15417"/><mod eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15413"/> ld <seg eID="C13_app33-fMS"/> on the <seg sID="C13_app35-fMS"/> contrary <seg eID="C13_app35-fMS"/> tears and <seg sID="C13_app37-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>wretched<lb n="c56-0073__main__16"/>ness<w ana="end"/>. <seg eID="C13_app37-fMS"/> And how, Victor, can I relate our <seg sID="C13_app39-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__17"/>misfortune <mod sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15430"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0073__main__d5e15437"/>? <sga-add eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15437"/><mod eID="c56-0073__main__d5e15430"/> <seg eID="C13_app39-fMS"/> absence cannot have rendered <lb n="c56-0073__main__18"/>you callous to our joys and <seg sID="C13_app41-fMS"/> griefs <seg eID="C13_app41-fMS"/> and how <seg sID="C13_app43-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__19"/>can <seg eID="C13_app43-fMS"/> I inflict pain on <seg sID="C13_app45-fMS"/> an <seg eID="C13_app45-fMS"/> absent <seg sID="C13_app47-fMS"/> child.? <seg eID="C13_app47-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__20"/>I wish to prepare you for the <seg sID="C13_app49-fMS"/> woeful <seg eID="C13_app49-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app50-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__21"/>news <seg eID="C13_app50-fMS"/> but I know it is impossible; even <lb n="c56-0073__main__22"/>now your eye skims over the <seg sID="C13_app52-fMS"/> page <seg eID="C13_app52-fMS"/> to <lb n="c56-0073__main__23"/>seek the words which are to convey to <lb n="c56-0073__main__24"/>you the horrible tidings. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C13_app54-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__25"/>William <seg eID="C13_app54-fMS"/> is <seg sID="C13_app56-fMS"/> dead! That <seg eID="C13_app56-fMS"/> sweet <seg sID="C13_app58-fMS"/> child <seg eID="C13_app58-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__26"/>whose smiles delighted & warmed <seg sID="C13_app60-fMS"/> me <seg eID="C13_app60-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__27"/>who was so <seg sID="C13_app62-fMS"/> gentle <seg eID="C13_app62-fMS"/> yet so <seg sID="C13_app64-fMS"/> gay, <seg eID="C13_app64-fMS"/> Victor, he <lb n="c56-0073__main__28"/>is Murdered! <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C13_app66-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__29"/>I <seg eID="C13_app66-fMS"/> will not attempt to <seg sID="C13_app68-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0073__main__d5e15471">o</del> console <seg eID="C13_app68-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app69-fMS"/> you <seg eID="C13_app69-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__30"/>but will simply relate the circumstances <lb n="c56-0073__main__31"/>of the transaction. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C13_app71-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__1"/>Last thurday (May <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15491">26</del> 28<shi rend="underline">th</shi>) I; <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15497"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15499">your <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15501"/>my <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15501"/> </del> <mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15497"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15507">cousin</del> <seg eID="C13_app71-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__2"/>my <seg sID="C13_app73-fMS"/> niece <seg eID="C13_app73-fMS"/> and your two <seg sID="C13_app75-fMS"/> brothers <seg eID="C13_app75-fMS"/> went to <lb n="c56-0074__main__3"/>walk in Plainpalais. The evening was <lb n="c56-0074__main__4"/>warm and serene, and we prolonged our <lb n="c56-0074__main__5"/>walk <seg sID="C13_app77-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15518">fat</del> farther than usual. It was <seg eID="C13_app77-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app78-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15524"> <shi rend="underline">ale</shi> </del> already dusk before we thought of <seg eID="C13_app78-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app79-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__7"/>returning <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15532"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15534">When</del> <seg eID="C13_app79-fMS"/> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15537"/>and then <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15537"/><mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15532"/>we <seg sID="C13_app82-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15541"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15543">found</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15546"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15546"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15552"/>discovered <seg eID="C13_app82-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15552"/><mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15541"/>that <seg sID="C13_app84-fMS"/> Ernest <seg eID="C13_app84-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__8"/>and <seg sID="C13_app86-fMS"/> William <seg eID="C13_app86-fMS"/> who had gone on before, <lb n="c56-0074__main__9"/>were not to be found. We accordingly <lb n="c56-0074__main__10"/>rested on a seat <seg sID="C13_app88-fMS"/> untill <seg eID="C13_app88-fMS"/> they should <lb n="c56-0074__main__11"/>return. Presently Ernest <seg sID="C13_app90-fMS"/> came <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15565">up</del> &<lb n="c56-0074__main__12"/>enquired for <seg eID="C13_app90-fMS"/> his <seg sID="C13_app92-fMS"/> brother <seg eID="C13_app92-fMS"/> he <seg sID="C13_app94-fMS"/> said <seg eID="C13_app94-fMS"/> that <seg sID="C13_app96-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__13"/>he <seg eID="C13_app96-fMS"/> had been playing <seg sID="C13_app98-fMS"/> with <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15573">them</del> him <lb n="c56-0074__main__14"/>and <seg eID="C13_app98-fMS"/> that William had run away to <lb n="c56-0074__main__15"/>hide <seg sID="C13_app100-fMS"/> himself <seg eID="C13_app100-fMS"/> and that he <seg sID="C13_app102-fMS"/> had <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15580"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15582">wai</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15585"/>vainly <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15585"/><mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15580"/><lb n="c56-0074__main__16"/>sought <seg eID="C13_app102-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app103-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15591">fo</del> for <seg eID="C13_app103-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app104-fMS"/> him <seg eID="C13_app104-fMS"/> & afterwards <seg sID="C13_app106-fMS"/> wai <lb n="c56-0074__main__17"/>ted <seg eID="C13_app106-fMS"/> a long <seg sID="C13_app108-fMS"/> time <seg eID="C13_app108-fMS"/> but that he did <lb n="c56-0074__main__18"/>not return. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C13_app110-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__19"/>This <seg eID="C13_app110-fMS"/> rather alarmed <seg sID="C13_app112-fMS"/> us <seg eID="C13_app112-fMS"/> and we <seg sID="C13_app114-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15603">sought</del> <lb n="c56-0074__main__20"/>continued to search <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15609"/>for him <seg eID="C13_app114-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app115-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15609"/>untill <seg eID="C13_app115-fMS"/> night <seg sID="C13_app117-fMS"/> fell <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15612">l</del> ; <seg eID="C13_app117-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__21"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0074.01"/><lb n="c56-0074__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0074__left_margin__d5e15623"/>when <sga-add eID="c56-0074__left_margin__d5e15623"/>Elizabeth conjectured that he might have <lb n="c56-0074__main__22"/>returned to the <seg sID="C13_app119-fMS"/> house: <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15629">but</del> <seg eID="C13_app119-fMS"/> he was <lb n="c56-0074__main__23"/>not <seg sID="C13_app121-fMS"/> there – <seg eID="C13_app121-fMS"/> We returned <seg sID="C13_app123-fMS"/> again <seg eID="C13_app123-fMS"/> with <seg sID="C13_app125-fMS"/> torches <seg eID="C13_app125-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__24"/>for I could not <seg sID="C13_app127-fMS"/> rest when I thought <seg eID="C13_app127-fMS"/> my <lb n="c56-0074__main__25"/>sweet <seg sID="C13_app129-fMS"/> child <seg eID="C13_app129-fMS"/> had lost himself, and <lb n="c56-0074__main__26"/>was exposed to all the damps & dews <lb n="c56-0074__main__27"/>of <seg sID="C13_app131-fMS"/> night; <seg eID="C13_app131-fMS"/> Elizabeth also suffered extreme <lb n="c56-0074__main__28"/>anguish. <seg sID="C13_app133-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15645">We found him</del> <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15648"/> <mdel>a</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15652"/>A <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15652"/><mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15648"/> bout <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15656"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15658">four</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0074.02"/><lb n="c56-0074__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0074__left_margin__d5e15667"/>seven <seg eID="C13_app133-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0074__left_margin__d5e15667"/><mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15656"/><lb n="c56-0074__main__29"/>in the morning I discovered my lovely <seg sID="C13_app135-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__30"/>boy <seg eID="C13_app135-fMS"/> whom the night before I had seen <lb n="c56-0075__main__1"/>blooming & active in <seg sID="C13_app137-fMS"/> health stretch <lb n="c56-0075__main__2"/>ed <seg eID="C13_app137-fMS"/> on the grass livid and <seg sID="C13_app139-fMS"/> motionless– <seg eID="C13_app139-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0075__main__3"/>the print of the <seg sID="C13_app141-fMS"/> murderers <seg eID="C13_app141-fMS"/> finger was <lb n="c56-0075__main__4"/>on his neck. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C13_app143-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0075__main__5"/>He <seg eID="C13_app143-fMS"/> was conveyed <seg sID="C13_app145-fMS"/> home <seg eID="C13_app145-fMS"/> and the <seg sID="C13_app147-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0075__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15698">extreme</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15701">wh</del> <mod sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15704"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15706">misery</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15709"/>anguish <seg eID="C13_app147-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app148-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15709"/><mod eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15704"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15713">agony</del> that was <lb n="c56-0075__main__7"/>visible in my countenance <seg eID="C13_app148-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app149-fMS"/> revealed <seg eID="C13_app149-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0075__main__8"/>the secret to Elizabeth. She was <seg sID="C13_app151-fMS"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0075.02"/><w ana="start"/>extreme<lb n="c56-0075__main__9"/>ly<w ana="end"/><delSpan anchor="c56-0075.02"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0075.03"/><lb n="c56-0075__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0075__left_margin__d5e15738"/>very <sga-add eID="c56-0075__left_margin__d5e15738"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0075.01"/> <seg eID="C13_app151-fMS"/> earnest to see the corpse. <seg sID="C13_app153-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15743">which</del> <mod sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15746"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15748"/>^ <sga-add eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15748"/> <mdel/> <mod eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15746"/><delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0075.05"/>for a <lb n="c56-0075__main__10"/>long time <delSpan anchor="c56-0075.05"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15765">refused</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0075.07"/><lb n="c56-0075__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" next="#c56-0075.06" sID="c56-0075__left_margin__d5e15774"/>At first I <sga-add eID="c56-0075__left_margin__d5e15774"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" xml:id="c56-0075.06" sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15779"/>attempted to prevent <seg eID="C13_app153-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app154-fMS"/> her <sga-add eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15779"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0075.04"/> <seg eID="C13_app154-fMS"/> but <seg sID="C13_app156-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15784"> <unclear extent="1" unit="chars"/> </del> she persisted, <lb n="c56-0075__main__11"/>and entering the room where it <seg eID="C13_app156-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app157-fMS"/> lay <lb n="c56-0075__main__12"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15793">quickly</del> <seg eID="C13_app157-fMS"/> hastily examined the neck of <lb n="c56-0075__main__13"/>the <seg sID="C13_app159-fMS"/> victim <seg eID="C13_app159-fMS"/> and clasping her <seg sID="C13_app161-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15799">hads</del> <lb n="c56-0075__main__14"/>hands <seg eID="C13_app161-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C13_app1148-fMS"/> I and <seg eID="C13_app1148-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__7"/>that shall be <seg sID="C13_app1150-fMS"/> proved – <seg eID="C13_app1150-fMS"/> fear <seg sID="C13_app1152-fMS"/> nothing <seg eID="C13_app1152-fMS"/> but let <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__8"/>your spirits be cheered by the assurance <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__9"/>of her <seg sID="C13_app1154-fMS"/> aquittal. <seg eID="C13_app1154-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__10"/>"How kind <seg sID="C13_app1156-fMS"/> your are," replied Elizabeth, <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__11"/>"every <seg eID="C13_app1156-fMS"/> one else believes in her guilt, and <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__12"/>that made me <seg sID="C13_app1158-fMS"/> wretched <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0091.01"/>for I would as <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__13"/>surely believe in my <delSpan anchor="c56-0091.01"/> <seg eID="C13_app1158-fMS"/> for I knew <seg sID="C13_app1160-fMS"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0091.03"/>it to <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__14"/>be <delSpan anchor="c56-0091.03"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0091__Pt1__main__d5e19515"/>that <seg eID="C13_app1160-fMS"/> it was <seg sID="C13_app1162-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0091__Pt1__main__d5e19515"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0091.02"/>impossible, <seg eID="C13_app1162-fMS"/> and to see every one else <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__15"/>prejudiced in so deadly a <seg sID="C13_app1164-fMS"/> manner <seg eID="C13_app1164-fMS"/> rendered <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__16"/>me hopeless and despairing." She <seg sID="C13_app1166-fMS"/> wept— <seg eID="C13_app1166-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app1167-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__17"/>"Sweet <seg eID="C13_app1167-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C13_app1168-fMS"/> niece" <seg eID="C13_app1168-fMS"/> said my <seg sID="C13_app1170-fMS"/> father dry <seg eID="C13_app1170-fMS"/> your <seg sID="C13_app1172-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__18"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0091__Pt1__main__d5e19529">eyes</del> tears <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0091.05"/>and do not give so sad <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0091__Pt1__main__d5e19535"/>sorrowful <sga-add eID="c56-0091__Pt1__main__d5e19535"/> a welc- <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__19"/>come to Victor who has been so long <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__20"/>absent <delSpan anchor="c56-0091.05"/> <seg eID="C13_app1172-fMS"/> if she <seg sID="C13_app1174-fMS"/> is <seg eID="C13_app1174-fMS"/> as you <seg sID="C13_app1176-fMS"/> believe innocent <seg eID="C13_app1176-fMS"/> rely <seg sID="C13_app1178-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0091__Pt1__main__d5e19546">that</del> <lb n="c56-0091__Pt1__main__21"/>on the justice of our <seg eID="C13_app1178-fMS"/>
